type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: LAND REGISTRY (VALIDATION OF AWARDS) ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Land Registry (Validation of Awards) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Land Registry (Validation of Awards) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Validation of certain awards.    __________________________ 5  of 1972 An Act to validate certain awards of titles purported to have been made under the Land Registry Act.  [21st SEPTEMBER, 1972]  Short title.    Validation of certain awards.    c. 5:02
type.context: LAND REGISTRY (VALIDATION OF AWARDS) ACT under Validation of certain awards.    __________________________ 5  of 1972 An Act to validate certain awards of titles purported to have been made under the Land Registry Act.  [21st SEPTEMBER, 1972]  Short title.    Validation of certain awards.    c. 5:02 2. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the Land Registry Act, all awards of title purported to have been made thereunder by a Commissioner of Title in respect of the lands situated in the area described in the Schedule of the Land Registry (Registration Area) (Demerara River) (No. 2) (Amendment) Order* shall, with effect from the respective dates of those awards, be deemed for all purposes to be valid and effectual in law as though the awards were made in compliance with the provisions of that Act.   __________    *O. 47/
type.description: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the Land Registry Act, all awards of title purported to have been made thereunder by a Commissioner of Title in respect of the lands situated in the area described in the Schedule of the Land Registry (Registration Area) (Demerara River) (No. 2) (Amendment) Order* shall, with effect from the respective dates of those awards, be deemed for all purposes to be valid and effectual in law as though the awards were made in compliance with the provisions of that Act.   __________    *O. 47/
